datasets.name: de920dc5
queryLines:
SELECT
  race_year,
  name,
  nationality,
  SUM(total_points) AS total_points,
  SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins,
  RANK() OVER (
      PARTITION BY race_year 
      ORDER BY SUM(total_points) DESC
  ) AS position
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year
GROUP BY race_year, name, nationality
ORDER BY position;

datasets.name: 19f0b05a
queryLines:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT driver_id) AS total_drivers
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year;

datasets.name: 14c03782
queryLines:
SELECT 
  name,
  SUM(total_points) AS total_points
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year
GROUP BY name
ORDER BY total_points DESC
LIMIT 1;

datasets.name: c515c963
queryLines:
SELECT 
  name,
  SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year
GROUP BY name
ORDER BY total_wins DESC
LIMIT 1;

datasets.name: cc0ef730
queryLines:
SELECT
  name,
  SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year
GROUP BY name
HAVING SUM(total_wins) > 0
ORDER BY total_wins DESC;

datasets.name: 9a028f47
queryLines:
SELECT
  name,
  SUM(total_points) AS total_points
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year
GROUP BY name
ORDER BY total_points DESC;

datasets.name: 1640025e
queryLines:
SELECT
  round,
  name,
  SUM(total_points) AS total_points
FROM f1_catalog.gold.driver_standings_gold
WHERE race_year = :race_year
GROUP BY round, name
ORDER BY round, total_points DESC;

datasets.name: 5008d8e4
queryLines:
SELECT
  r.year AS race_year,
  c.name AS constructor_name,
  SUM(cs.points) AS total_points,
  SUM(cs.wins) AS total_wins,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY r.year ORDER BY SUM(cs.points) DESC) AS position
FROM f1_catalog.gold.constructor_standings_gold cs
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.races_silver r ON cs.race_id = r.race_id
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.constructors_silver c ON cs.constructor_id = c.constructor_id
WHERE r.year = :race_year
GROUP BY r.year, c.name
ORDER BY position;

datasets.name: 9db0f5f2
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.name AS constructor_name,
  SUM(cs.points) AS total_points
FROM f1_catalog.gold.constructor_standings_gold cs
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.races_silver r ON cs.race_id = r.race_id
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.constructors_silver c ON cs.constructor_id = c.constructor_id
WHERE r.year = :race_year
GROUP BY c.name
ORDER BY total_points DESC;

datasets.name: 8f153e3c
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.name AS constructor_name,
  SUM(cs.wins) AS total_wins
FROM f1_catalog.gold.constructor_standings_gold cs
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.races_silver r ON cs.race_id = r.race_id
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.constructors_silver c ON cs.constructor_id = c.constructor_id
WHERE r.year = :race_year
GROUP BY c.name
ORDER BY total_wins DESC;

datasets.name: 9566590d
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.name AS top_constructor,
  SUM(cs.points) AS max_points
FROM f1_catalog.gold.constructor_standings_gold cs
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.races_silver r ON cs.race_id = r.race_id
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.constructors_silver c ON cs.constructor_id = c.constructor_id
WHERE r.year = :race_year
GROUP BY c.name
ORDER BY max_points DESC
LIMIT 1;

datasets.name: bab8148f
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.name AS top_constructor,
  SUM(cs.wins) AS max_wins
FROM f1_catalog.gold.constructor_standings_gold cs
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.races_silver r ON cs.race_id = r.race_id
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.constructors_silver c ON cs.constructor_id = c.constructor_id
WHERE r.year = :race_year
GROUP BY c.name
ORDER BY max_wins DESC
LIMIT 1;

datasets.name: 27e105a8
queryLines:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT cs.constructor_id) AS num_constructors
FROM f1_catalog.gold.constructor_standings_gold cs
JOIN f1_catalog.silver.races_silver r ON cs.race_id = r.race_id
WHERE r.year = :race_year;
